name: Eukarion Tales: Origins
description:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2363700/Eukarion_Tales_2/

Unearth the origins of Marcus, the valiant Knight of Adamantia, in this nostalgic retro-flash, isometric RPG game which precedes Eukarion Tales 2. Follow Marcus’ extraordinary transformation from a humble squire to a legendary hero, as you immerse yourself in a rich, fantasy-filled storyline within a captivating European Middle Age-inspired world.



Engage in intense battles against hordes of enemies, ranging from vicious bandits to awe-inspiring mythical creatures. Unlock and upgrade a multitude of unique abilities, shaping Marcus into a formidable force. Delve into an enthralling blend of strategic decision-making and adrenaline-fueled action, as you navigate through picturesque castles, lush forests, and ancient ruins.



Eukarion Tales: Origins delivers countless hours of pure Hack'n Slash and RPG fun, allowing you to relish in the nostalgia of the retro gaming era. Embrace the simplicity of point-and-click movement and attack, with an auto-attack feature available to be switched on and off, so you can tailor your retro experience to your liking!



Prepare for an unforgettable adventure where the fate of Marcus and the Diamond Order hangs in the balance. Shape his destiny, make impactful choices, and become a legendary Knight in a world teetering on the edge of darkness.

Key Features:
Unveil Marcus’ journey from squire to legendary Knight in a retro Flash game
Battle hordes of enemies and upgrade your character's abilities
Immerse yourself in a fantasy-filled storyline inspired by the European Middle Age
Engage in strategic decision-making and adrenaline-fueled action
Explore picturesque landscapes and iconic locations
Hours of pure Hack'n Slash and RPG enjoyment

Developer’s Note:

This game is an artifact, a title developed by a small indie team using the full potential and limitations of flash technology back in the early 2000s. We apologize for any technical problems or inconveniences you may encounter in your playthrough. We hope that with these limitations in mind, you may still enjoy the experience!
